welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Cardona, Philippines! Known for its rich history and breathtaking views of the Laguna de Bay, we invite you to immerse yourself in our charming city and discover all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and happy exploring!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern terminal primarily used by Philippine Airlines for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A small terminal primarily used by low-cost carriers for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
